EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-04-14-UI Survey.UI Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback on New VMTurbo 5.5 User Interface
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, We've been working to improve our user interface and want to make sure it meets your needs. With our latest release (VMTurbo 5.5) we rolled out a preview of our new user interface. Please take this short survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/KW5JH9R]]>, it won't take any more than 3 minutes to tell us what you think. If you have not yet upgraded you can learn more about what's new in 5.5 here <[[http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-enhances-private-and-public-cloud-control-with-its-5-5-release/]]> Stay Green, Your Dedicated Customer Experience Team
